title: Sound Off - Oct. 8
text:
By DONOVAN KLEIN October 8, 2015 Updated Oct 8, 2015 at 8:19 PM EDT 
FORT WAYNE, IND. (21ALIVE) - 21Alive's Tommy Schoegler and Kent Hormann are live from the SportONE/Parkview Fieldhouse for the October 8 episode of Sound Off presented by Parkview Medicine. 
Blue goals? The guys discuss the new partnership that the ECHL hockey league made with Geico Insurance that will make every goal in the league blue this year instead of the traditional red color. Is this another instance of sports advertising going a little too far? 
Also, the MLB playoff stage is officially set. The guys talk about how important the playoffs actually are and who could be the World Series champions this years when the smoke clears and the dust settles.
